name: Wagon
description: A car with a comparatively long body containing a large carrying space, reached through a rear door: usually the back seats can be folded forward to increase the carrying space.

products.description: Wagon class C with front-wheel drive. The premiere of the fourth generation of the model took place on November 11, 2019 as part of a special event in the Czech Republic.
Front-wheel drive station wagon class B. The world premiere of the restyled version of the second generation of the Logan MCV model took place at the Paris Motor Show in 2016 under the Dacia brand.
Front-wheel drive station wagon class C. The second restyling of the third generation of the model. Official information about the modernized station wagon was presented on February 26, 2020.
Front-wheel drive station wagon class C. The premiere show of the third generation of the model took place at the Geneva Motor Show in March 2018.
All-wheel drive station wagon class I. The world premiere of the facelift version of the fifth generation of the model took place at the New York Auto Show in April 2017.
Wagon class C. The world premiere of the model took place at the Frankfurt Motor Show in September 2013.
The off-road version of the V90 station wagon. The world premiere of the model took place at the Los Angeles Auto Show in November 2016.
Front-wheel drive station wagon class B. The official show of the upgraded version of the third generation of the model took place at the Geneva Motor Show in March 2018.
Front-wheel drive station wagon with increased cross-country ability of class C. The off-road version of the fourth generation of the model debuted in November 2018.
An all-wheel drive class D off-road wagon built on the basis of a restyled version of the third generation of the Combi model in the station wagon body. The car debuted in May 2019.
Five-door station wagon class C. A restyled version of the second generation of the model was first shown in early summer 2017.
Wagon class D with rear-wheel drive. Restyling of the fourth generation of the model (index S205). The premiere presentation of the car took place at the Geneva Motor Show on March 6, 2018.
Front-wheel drive station wagon class C. The debut of the car took place at the Paris Motor Show in the fall of 2018.
